law.catch_line: "Franchise" means a written arrangement, whether or not for a definite period, in which a manufactur...
law.text: "Franchise" means a written arrangement, whether or not for a definite period, in which a manufacturer, distributor, or factory branch grants to a dealer or distributor a license or right to use a trade name, trademark, service mark, or related characteristic in the sale, leasing, or servicing of new vehicles.
